comment: She immediately downvoted my post to hide it, so I'll just repost it on my own account: she's literally using the same logic she's criticizing. Oh, so "diversity is our strength" is an NPC line? Fine, what about "love your race"? How is that not an NPC line? And yet everyone on Gab is all excited about this meme, proving they're also NPCs.
